languages.text: "Крик скверны укрылся в этом логове?! Я желаю лично сразить его во славу своей стаи! Эттфатер, возьми меня в свой отряд, выследим и расправимся с этим чудовищем прежде, чем Хальбрандт до него доберется!"
"Doomscream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"
languages.original_text: "Крик скверны укрылся в этом логове?! Я желаю лично сразить его во славу своей стаи! Эттфатер, возьми меня в свой отряд, выследим и расправимся с этим чудовищем прежде, чем Хальбрандт до него доберется!"

traits.locale_text: "Balescream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"
"Balescream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"
"Balescream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"
"Balescream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"
"Doomscream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"
"Doomscream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"

languages.text: “灾啸？他就躲在这个巢穴里吗？为了狼群的荣耀，我要亲手杀了他！狼领，让我加入你的队伍吧！我们一定要赶在哈尔布兰特之前找到这头畜生，把他干掉！”
languages.original_text: "Doomscream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"

traits.locale_text: “灾啸？他就躲在这个巢穴里吗？为了狼群的荣耀，我想亲手杀了他！狼领，让我加入你的队伍吧！我们一定要赶在哈尔布兰特之前找到这头畜生，把他干掉！”

languages.text: « Le Fléau Hurlant ? Il se cache dans ce repaire ? Je souhaite le tuer pour la gloire de ma meute ! Aett-vater, laissez-moi vous accompagner ! Nous traquerons ce monstre et l'abattrons avant qu'Halbrandt n'en ait l'occasion ! »
languages.original_text: "Doomscream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"

traits.locale_text: « Le Fléau Hurlant ? Il se cache dans ce repaire ? Je souhaite le tuer pour la gloire de ma meute ! Aett-vater, laissez-moi vous accompagner ! Nous traquerons ce monstre et l'abattrons avant qu'Halbrandt n'en ait l'occasion ! »

languages.text: 「ドゥームスクリーム？奴はここに潜んでいるのか？我が群れの栄光のために奴を殺してやる！アエット＝ヴァテル、俺をお前の一団に入れろ！ハルブラントより先に奴を追い詰め、倒すぞ！」
languages.original_text: "Doomscream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"

traits.locale_text: 「ベイルスクリーム？奴はここに潜んでいるのか？我が群れの栄光のために奴を殺してやる！アエット＝ヴァテル、俺をお前の一団に入れろ！ハルブラントより先に奴を追い詰め、倒すぞ！」

languages.text: «¿Doomscream? ¿Se esconde en esta guarida? ¡Lo mataré para gloria de mi jauría! ¡Aett-Vater, deje que me una a su banda! ¡Encontraremos a esta bestia y la abatiremos antes que Halbrandt!».
languages.original_text: "Doomscream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Balescream? ¿Se esconde en esta guarida? ¡Lo mataré para gloria de mi jauría! ¡Aett-Vater, deje que me una a su banda! ¡Encontraremos a esta bestia y la abatiremos antes que Halbrandt!».

languages.text: "Unheilsschrei? Er versteckt sich in diesem Loch? Ich will ihn für den Ruhm meines Rudels töten! Aett-Vater, nehmt mich in Euren Jagdtrupp auf! Wir werden diese Bestie aufspüren und ihn niederstrecken, bevor Halbrandt das kann!"
languages.original_text: "Doomscream? He hides in this den? I wish to slay him for the glory of my pack! Aett-Vater, take me into your band! We will track this beast down and fell him before Halbrandt can!"

traits.locale_text: "Unheilsschrei? Er versteckt sich in diesem Loch? Ich will ihn für den Ruhm meines Rudels töten! Aett-Vater, nehmt mich in Euren Jagdtrupp auf! Wir werden diese Bestie aufspüren und ihn niederstrecken, bevor Halbrandt das kann!"
